modName: Divine Talos Statue - HD 2K and Ultra-HD 4K Texture
summary: A texture replacer for the Statue of Talos  which makes it shiny gold and jade green worthy of its divine status. Available in HD (2K) and UHD (4K)
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://imageshack.us/scaled/large/198/banner2900x581.jpg[/img]
[color=#909090][i]"Terrible and powerful Talos! We, your unworthy servants, give praise! For only through your grace and benevolence may we truly reach enlightenment! And deserve our praise you do, for we are one! Ere you ascended and the Eight became Nine, you walked among us, great Talos, not as god, but as man! But you were once man ..." [/i][b] - Heimskr, Priest from Whiterun[/b][/color]
[img]https://imageshack.us/scaled/large/600/tesv2013060521173053.jpg[/img][img]https://imageshack.us/scaled/large/560/tesv2013060521255440.jpg[/img][img]https://imageshack.us/scaled/large/843/tesv2013060521422011.jpg[/img] [/center]
[b]Divine Talos Statue[/b]
This is a texture replacer for the Statue of Talos. The statue is now made of valuable materials:
pure gold and malachite (or green jade) to reflect his importance to the people of Skyrim.
Version 2.1 comes with two high resolution settings: Ultra HD-4K and HD-2K.

FEATURES:
- Ultra High Defintion 4k retexture by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5099468/?tb=mods&pUp=1]jeclxohko[/url]
- Also available in HD (2K) quality
- Enhanced Normal map and meshes for realistic "gold" shine (recommended for ENB users)
- Recolored Gold and Jade green
- Enhanced details on original texture
- version 2.1: added scales and details on the serpent
- version 2.1: metallic shine applied by default (on gold statue only)

=======================================================================
Installation:
=======================================================================
Extract the archive contents into your Skyrim data folder, overwrite the files when prompted.

=======================================================================
Special Thanks to:
=======================================================================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/571605/?]CaBal120[/url] for showing us how to improve the specularity and shine of the textures
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5099468/?]jeclxohko[/url] for the high quality 4K retexture of the Talos Statue

=======================================================================
Permissions:
=======================================================================
You may not upload this mod to any other site other than NEXUS
You may not use or "modify" this mod for your own mods without permission from the author(s).
[center]
[youtube]lSvLHDhubbU[/youtube]
Thanks to Hodilton for this video.
